name: RAM
description: Use these Windows 10 commands to quickly find memory module information without taking the computer apart or using third-party apps.

name: SSD
description: Another useful bit of info is in the top-right corner, where it shows you the amount of data that has been written to the driveâ€”in this instance, about 62TB. This is important to know since most SSDs.

name: PROCESSOR
description: A processor is an integrated electronic circuit that performs the calculations that run a computer. A processor performs arithmetical, logical, input/output (I/O) and other basic instructions that are passed from an operating system (OS).
